description: This file contains unit tests for the Vue.js component 'HelloWorld'. It uses Vitest framework to verify that the component renders the expected text when mounted.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines a test case to verify the rendering of the component.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Assertion function used to check if the component's text contains 'Hello Vitest'.

ctags.name: wrapper
ctags.pattern: /^    const wrapper = mount(HelloWorld, { props: { msg: 'Hello Vitest' } })$/
